comments:
I20030723

I got an error when switching to Debug perspective after startup. Might be
caused by Platform Ant launch config delegate.

!SESSION Jul 25, 2003 08:22:51.619 ---------------------------------------------
java.version=1.4.1_02
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=de_CH
Command-line arguments: -update -showlocation -data
c:\eclipse\workspaces\Development_2_2\plugins -install
file:C:/eclipse/drops/I20030723/
!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.ui 4 120 Jul 25, 2003 08:22:51.619
!MESSAGE Error logged from Debug UI: 
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: An error occurred attempting to expand
the variable project. No resource selected.
	at
org.eclipse.debug.core.variables.DefaultVariableExpander.throwExpansionException(DefaultVariableExpander.java:62)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.variables.ResourceExpander.getResources(ResourceExpander.java:96)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.ui.launchVariables.RefreshTab.expandResources(RefreshTab.java:363)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.ui.launchVariables.RefreshTab.getResourcesForRefreshScope(RefreshTab.java:333)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.ui.launchVariables.RefreshTab.refreshResources(RefreshTab.java:284)
	at
org.eclipse.ant.ui.internal.launchConfigurations.AntLaunchDelegate.launch(AntLaunchDelegate.java:219)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:156)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:755)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools.buildAndLaunch(DebugUITools.java:550)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools$2.run(DebugUITools.java:499)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:101)
!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.core 4 4 Jul 25, 2003 08:22:51.619
!MESSAGE An error occurred attempting to expand the variable project. No
resource selected.

Looks like an Ant build was started that uses a variable bound to the "selected 
resource", but there was no selection at the time the variable was expaneded 
(due to a perspective change?). This is a problem with the current variable 
support - the time of the launch and the time of the variable resolution are 
far enough apart that the resolution may not work.

Variables have been completely re-written. This code does not exist in the 
same state. Closing. Will re-address if a problem is encountered in the new 
code base.

traces.message: An error occurred attempting to expand the variable project. No resource selected.
